snippet: Mexico's economy secretary said Friday that he looks forward to starting negotiations with the U.S. to update the North American Free Trade Agreement, but his country does not want to see tariffs imposed on goods produced in his country....

headline.main: The Latest: Trump Pushes Vouchers in Florida School Visit
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Trump Pushes Vouchers in Florida School Visit

lead_paragraph: Mexico's economy secretary said Friday that he looks forward to starting negotiations with the U.S. to update the North American Free Trade Agreement, but his country does not want to see tariffs imposed on goods produced in his country.
